Title: Koseki Bijou
GameText: POWER - Jewel of Emotions: 1 Hero target regains 2 HP. If that target is in an ally's play area, Bijou regains 1 HP and draws 1 card.

Title: Bonbijou!
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Either summon 1 Relic card or salvage 1 Pebble card.
Play 1 Ongoing or Pebble card.

Title: Dang It!
GameText:
After this card is played, you may play or salvage 1 Pebble card.
Bijou deals 1 target 3 psychic damage. 
Bijou may deal 1 Hero target 2 fixed psychic damage. If she deals damage this way, 1 Hero may use 1 power.

Title: Gaming Rock
GameText:
PLAY PHASE
You may play 1 Pebble card.
END PHASE
Either draw 1 card or salvage 1 Pebble card.

Title: Jeweled Crown
GameText:
-1 damage dealt to Bijou.
POWER: Collect 1 Ongoing card. You may destroy 1 Pebble card. If you do, play 1 card.
Quote: "I'm not bald! I just wanted to put my crown down!"

Title: Jottem
GameText:
After this card is played, you may play or salvage 1 Pebble card.
REACTION: Bijou deals the attacker 3 melee damage. Either destroy 1 Pebble card or destroy this card.
REACTION: Salvage 1 Pebble card.

Title: Kira Kira Koseki!
GameText:
After this card is played, you may play or salvage 1 Pebble card.
+1 damage dealt by Bijou.
POWER: Bijou deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Either 1 ally regains 2 HP or Bijou deals 1 ally character 1 fixed psychic damage. If damage is dealt this way, the associated Hero draws 1 card.

Title: Pebble
GameText:
Play this next to a Hero target, then draw 1 card.
That target gains this reaction:
REACTION: Prevent the damage. Destroy this card.

Title: Rock Hard
GameText:
After this card is played, you may play or salvage 1 Pebble card.
-X damage dealt to Hero targets, where X is the number of Pebble cards in their play area.
START PHASE
Play or salvage 1 Pebble card. Destroy this card.

Title: Sparkling Madness
GameText:
Destroy any number of Pebble cards.
Each Hero target deals themselves 1 fixed psychic damage for each Pebble card in their play area.
Draw 1 card for each Pebble card in your trash.
Shuffle your trash into your deck.

Title: Together Strong
GameText:
Salvage all Pebble cards in your trash. 
You may play any number of Pebble cards.
Each Hero target regains 2 HP for each Pebble card in their play area.

Title: Unflappable
GameText:
After Bijou is dealt psychic damage, she may regain the same amount of HP. If she regains HP this way, discard 1 card.
END PHASE
Play 1 Pebble card from your trash.

Title: Violent Boulder
GameText:
Bijou deals 1 target 5 melee damage.
Either destroy 1 Pebble card, or Bijou deals herself 2 fixed psychic damage.

After a Pebble card is destroyed, Bijou may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play that Pebble card from the trash.
START PHASE
Draw 2 cards. Destroy this card.
